full_summary:
# W684H-230132 Janitorial Services at HMC Dockyard

### Official Call for Proposals (RFP)
The Department of National Defence, CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia is inviting proposals from qualified Offerors to provide janitorial services for multiple buildings at HMC Dockyard.

### Summary of Requirements
The contract period is expected to commence on July 1, 2024 and end on June 30, 2026, with an optional three-year extension. Offerors are expected to provide complete janitorial services, including cleaning and maintenance of buildings.

### Evaluation Criteria
This RFP seeks a proposal that demonstrates the Offeror's ability to deliver janitorial services in a timely and effective manner, while also ensuring a high level of quality and safety. The selection criteria are based on the following factors:

- **Price**: The lowest price will be the primary consideration in evaluating proposals.
- **Quality of Services**: Offerors must provide evidence of their ability to deliver janitorial services that meet the required standards.
- **Experience**: The Offeror must have relevant experience in providing janitorial services, particularly in the military sector.
- **Sustainability**: Offerors must demonstrate a commitment to sustainability and environmental responsibility in their janitorial services.

### Site Visit and Mandatory Documentation
A mandatory site visit will be conducted on April 19, 2024 at 9:00 AM ADT. It is strongly recommended that Offerors attend the site visit to gain a better understanding of the work required and the existing facilities. To attend, Offerors must communicate with the Contracting Authority by April 16, 2024 to confirm attendance and provide the names of their representatives. Security requirements are outlined in the attached document.

### Request for Proposals Documents
The RFP and all supporting documents can be downloaded from [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19161748](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19161748). Submit your bid by May 8, 2024 at 2:00 PM ADT.
### Key Dates

* RFP Release Date: March 20, 2024
* Site Visit: April 19, 2024
* Submissions Deadline: May 8, 2024 at 2:00 PM ADT

Please submit any questions or concerns via email to the Contracting Authority. [maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maryse.cyr@tpsgc-p
